name: Ares Management Corporation
description: Ares Management Corporation is a global alternative investment manager that provides innovative investment solutions across a variety of asset classes, including private equity, real estate, credit, and infrastructure. Founded in 1997, Ares has grown to become one of the largest asset managers in the world, with over $300 billion in assets under management. The company operates through various segments: Ares Private Equity, Ares Real Estate, and Ares Credit Group, each specializing in delivering tailored investment strategies to meet the diverse needs of its clients. Ares is known for its disciplined investment approach, a strong emphasis on risk management, and a commitment to operational excellence. With a global footprint, Ares has offices in North America, Europe, and Asia, allowing it to leverage local market insights and foster strong relationships with a wide array of stakeholders. The company is dedicated to building lasting value for its investors and partners, and it prides itself on its collaborative culture and commitment to integrity. Ares Management works diligently to align its interests with those of its clients, ensuring a focus on long-term performance and sustainable investment practices. The firm’s mission is to empower its clients to achieve their financial goals while contributing to the growth and development of the communities in which it operates.
